name: Easy Extremely Garlic Shrimp
author: DesiLuGirl
summary: This shrimp dish has a great and powerful garlic flavor. It's perfect with pasta or with rice. You can even add juice from a lemon for that extra zing!
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
3 tablespoons garlic salt, or to taste
3 tablespoons garlic powder, or to taste
½  lemon, juiced, or to taste
directions: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir minced garlic until lightly browned
Add shrimp; season with garlic salt and garlic powder
Continue to cook and stir until shrimp are bright pink on the outside and the meat is no longer transparent in the center, 5 to 10 minutes
